testcase.name: Trash functionality
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to https://evernote.com....................................passed And I login with sign in link...............................................passed Given I click the notebook button...........................................passed And I click the trash button................................................passed And I click the empty trash button..........................................passed And I click the notes button................................................passed And I create 3 note with title as test title a and body as test body a......passed And I delete all notes......................................................passed And I click the notebook button.............................................passed And I click the trash button................................................passed Then the 1 test title a is in the notes list................................passed Then the 2 test title a is in the notes list................................passed Then the 3 test title a is in the notes list................................passed And I click the empty trash button..........................................passed Then the trash is empty.....................................................passed

testcase.name: Trash Restore
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to https://evernote.com....................................passed And I login with sign in link...............................................passed Given I create 1 note with title as test title b and body as test body b....passed And I delete all notes......................................................passed And I click the notebook button.............................................passed And I click the trash button................................................passed And I restore test title b..................................................passed And I click the notes button................................................passed Then the test title b is in the notes list..................................passed
